> <OLD>
>
> "There are so many things I never got to ask you. One of them b=
eing, how does one find the perfect balance between trust and loyalty? And =
how does one find peace in an atmosphere full of tension? But most of all O=
ptimus, our paths appear to be the same, our values, our courage, our stren=
gth and our faith in those around us. Are our origins alike? If so, is ther=
e a direction I should be going toward? One that will help me to guide the =
Autobots and Maximals to finding the road toward peaceful existance? If any=
one would know these answers, you would."
>
> He puts a tiny orb of his own=
 spark into a container, and gives it as an offering to Optimus Prime.

<NE=
W>

The body and form of Optimus Prime remained absolutely still, there
was=
 no discernable movement from him, no spark of energy, no sign of
recogniti=
on of any type. It could be that the Matrix energy that had
been animate be=
fore has been temporarily used up, or perhaps the
situation now was not suf=
ficiently critical so as to call it into
being. In either case Optimus prim=
e looked, for all intents and
purposes, as dead as any robot can appear and=
 still be awaiting a
rebirth in another few million years.

(TAG)

Preston
